column1: 1,john.smith@techcorp.com,John Smith,Project Alpha - Budget Approval Needed,"Hi Team,
I need urgent approval for the Project Alpha budget increase. We're looking at an additional $50K for Q1 due to unexpected infrastructure costs.
Can we schedule a meeting this week to discuss? The deadline for approval is Friday.
2,newsletter@techweekly.com,Tech Weekly,Your Weekly Tech Digest - Jan 15,"Hello Subscriber,
Here's your weekly roundup of the latest in technology:
3,sarah.johnson@clientco.com,Sarah Johnson,Re: Q4 Deliverables Status,"Thanks for the update. The deliverables look great!
I have a few minor comments on the design document. Can you incorporate them by Wednesday?
Also, let's set up a call next week to discuss Q1 planning.
4,hr@company.com,HR Department,Reminder: Performance Review Due Jan 20,"Dear Employee,
This is a reminder that your self-assessment for the annual performance review is due by January 20, 2024.
Please complete the form in the HR portal at your earliest convenience.
If you have questions, contact your manager or HR representative.
You have been selected to receive $1,000,000 in our exclusive lottery!
Click here immediately to claim your prize. This offer expires in 24 hours!
Attached is invoice #INV-2024-001 for the consulting services provided in December 2023.
Please confirm receipt and let me know if you need any additional information.
7,alerts@github.com,GitHub,Security Alert: Vulnerability Detected in Repository,"A security vulnerability has been detected in your repository 'ai-platform'.
We recommend updating to version 4.17.21 or higher immediately.
